name: Primary Visual Cortex (V1)
description: Processes basic visual input in the occipital lobe.

name: Fusiform Face Area (FFA)
description: Involved in facial recognition in the fusiform gyrus.

name: Dorsolateral Prefrontal Cortex (DLPFC)
description: Handles executive functions and working memory.

name: Posterior Parietal Cortex (PPC)
description: Supports visuospatial attention and sensory integration.

name: Anterior Cingulate Cortex (ACC)
description: Linked to decision-making and emotion regulation.

name: Supplementary Motor Area (SMA)
description: Contributes to motor planning and initiation.
